properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 1:34PM MST until January 11 at 1:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Blowing snow expected on the Camas
Prairie. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds could
gust up to 55 mph near Grangeville.

* WHERE...Camas Prairie, Grangeville and vicinity, and Greer
Grade.

* WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to midnight PST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult to impossible on the Camas
Prairie. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility on
the Camas Prairie and over Whitebird Grade. Strong cross winds
will create hazardous driving conditions for high profile
vehicles on Highway 95 south and west of Grangeville.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT
